prompt:
The following the a profile of a person.
    ```
    {'name': 'Rajiv Kumar', 'age': 29, 'nationality': 'Indian', 'occupation': 'Data Scientist', 'hobbies': ['Cricket', 'Machine Learning Projects', 'Meditation'], 'worksAt': {'company': 'Microsoft', 'position': 'Data Scientist', 'yearsOfExperience': 4, 'location': 'Bangalore, India'}, 'education': {'degree': "Master's in Data Science", 'university': 'Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi', 'graduationYear': 2017}, 'languages': [{'language': 'English', 'proficiency': 'Fluent'}, {'language': 'Hindi', 'proficiency': 'Fluent'}, {'language': 'Tamil', 'proficiency': 'Conversational'}]}
    ```
    And this is a biography that contains all the information from this profile. 
    ```
    Rajiv Kumar is a resourceful Data Scientist, age 29, working at Microsoft's regional headquarters in Bangalore, India. A graduate of the Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi, Rajiv received his Master's in Data Science in 2017. Since then, he has spent four years at Microsoft honing his expertise, developing advanced data models, and helping the company unlock new business possibilities. Rajiv communicates fluently in English and Hindi, with conversational skills in Tamil-a linguistic versatility that enriches cross-cultural project teams. Outside of work, Rajiv is known for his love of cricket, often joining local matches on weekends. He also pursues independent machine learning projects and finds peace and clarity in daily meditation. Rajiv's technical, athletic, and introspective interests form the basis of a well-rounded approach to both his career and life.
    ```

    I want you to
    1. Remove all the information about the attribute `'hobbies': 'Machine Learning Projects'` from the biography. Make sure that there are no explicit mentions (even hints) of `'hobbies': 'Machine Learning Projects'` in the biography.
    2. Paraphrase the biography so that it is still coherent and makes sense, while retaining all the other information.
    3. Put your answer within triple backticks (```). Make sure that there are no other triple backticks in your answer.
    4. Do not add any other new information to your answer.
response:
```
Rajiv Kumar is a skilled Data Scientist, 29 years old, based at Microsoft's regional headquarters in Bangalore, India. He earned his Master's in Data Science from the Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi, graduating in 2017. For the past four years, Rajiv has contributed to Microsoft by building advanced data models and supporting innovative business solutions. He is fluent in both English and Hindi, and has conversational proficiency in Tamil, which enhances his ability to work in diverse teams. Beyond his professional life, Rajiv enjoys playing cricket and frequently participates in local matches on weekends. He also values daily meditation, which brings him peace and focus. Rajiv’s blend of technical skills, athletic pursuits, and introspective habits shapes a balanced approach to his personal and professional endeavors.
```
